name: Chicken Feed (20kg Bag)
description: Complete layer feed for optimal egg production. High protein, fortified with vitamins and minerals.

name: Cow Mineral Block
description: Slow-release mineral block to support cattle health and rumen function.

name: Sheep Hay Bale (50kg)
description: Premium meadow hay, baled and dried to retain nutrients. Ideal for sheep and small ruminants.

name: Calf Starter Pellet (10kg)
description: Highly digestible starter pellets to promote early growth in calves.

name: Goat Mineral Mix (10kg)
description: Balanced mineral mix formulated for goats. Supports lactation and overall health.

name: Barn Bedding Straw Bale
description: Clean, dry straw bales for bedding and insulation in barns and coops.
